txt.en: Burning the Barricades
TBD
Barricades and torches can be found and the south-east and south-west gates of Torsbury.\n\nYou should use nearby torches to burn the barricades at the gates of Torsbury.
Burn the second barricade
Use torch to burn the second barricade
While scouting the gates of Torsbury, you discovered wooden barricades that might be destroyed to weaken the defences.
You should use nearby torches to burn the barricades at the gates of Torsbury.

Thane Tordag is at his encampment, north of the road between Torsbury and Stoke.\n\nYou should return to Thane Tordag and give him your report on the situation at Torsbury.
